Lateral view.gif){#fig-gray1918-image205} ![Left Humerus (Posterior view) @grayAnatomyHumanBody1918](/The Archive/Images/Gray anatomy 1918 images/Osteology/image208 gray1918 Left humerus. Posterior view.gif){#fig-gray1918-image208} ::: {.callout title="Reading list"} - Triceps and Anconeus Muscle @donnellyTravellSimonsSimons2019 - @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017 - Long head MMT @weinstockNeuroKineticTherapyInnovative2010 - Middle head MMT @weinstockNeuroKineticTherapyInnovative2010 - Lateral head MMT @weinstockNeuroKineticTherapyInnovative2010 ::: ::: {#tbl-oian .cell message='false' execution_count=1} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ```{=html}
Muscle Origin Insertion Innervation Action
Triceps brachii lateral head Posterior humerus just *proximal* to radial groove
Lateral intermuscular septum		 Olecranon of Ulna Radial n.
C6 - C8		 Elbow: Extension
Triceps brachii Long head Infraglenoid tubercle of Scapula Olecranon of Ulna Radial n.
C6 - C8		 Elbow: Extension
GHJ: Extension, Adduction
Triceps brachii medial head Posterior humerus just distal to radial groove
Medial intermuscular septum		 Olecranon of Ulna Radial n.
C6 - C8		 Elbow: Extension
``` ::: ::: # Long Head ## Origin {#origin} Infraglenoid tubercle of scapula @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ![Left Scapula (Anterior view) @grayAnatomyHumanBody1918](/The Archive/Images/Gray anatomy 1918 images/Osteology/image202 gray1918 Left scapula. Costal surface.gif){#fig-gray19180image202} ## Insertion {#insertion} Olecranon process of Ulna @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Innervation {#innervation} [Radial N.]({{< var ref-radial-nerve.path >}}) ([C6]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c6 >}}), [C7]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c7 >}}), [C8]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c8 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Action {#action} - **Elbow**: Extension @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **Shoulder**: Extension, Adduction @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Medial Head ## Origin {#origin} - Posterior surface of humerus (distal to radial groove) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - Medial intermuscular septum @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Insertion {#insertion} Olecranon process @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Innervation {#innervation} [Radial N.]({{< var ref-radial-nerve.path >}}) ([C6]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c6 >}}), [C7]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c7 >}}), [C8]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c8 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Action {#action} **Elbow**: Extension @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Lateral Head ## Origin {#origin} - Posterior surface of humerus (prox to radial groove) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - Lateral intermuscular septum @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Insertion {#insertion} Olecranon process @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Innervation {#innervation} [Radial N.]({{< var ref-radial-nerve.path >}}) ([C6]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c6 >}}), [C7]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c7 >}}), [C8]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c8 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Action {#action} **Elbow**: Extension @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Notes # Triceps Reflex {#reflex} Triceps reflex can be used to assess C7 nerve root @hongReliabilityDiagnosticAccuracy2022
